response.overview: Prince shattered all expectations and made music history when he released the album PURPLE RAIN in June 1984, followed by the hit movie of the same name weeks later. The 9-track LP went on to win two Grammy awards ("Best Rock Performance by a Group" & "Best Album of Original Score Written For A Motion Picture"), two American Music Awards, a Brit Award, and an Academy Award for Best Original Song Score.  NPG Records and Paisley Park Enterprises, in partnership with Warner Records, are pleased to announce the release of a brand-new audiophile Blu-ray featuring 2024’s Dolby ATMOS mix of the iconic album, as well as Prince’s original 1984 stereo mix in high-definition 24bit / 96kHz audio.
response.title: Purple Rain Blu-ray Audio

titles.title: Prince And The Revolution - Purple Rain
